changeSet.author: Inaam
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `service_market_pakistan`.`user_details` ( `date_of_birth` DATE NOT NULL , `nic_number` VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL , `nic_expiry_date` DATE NOT NULL , `latitude` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , `longitude` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , `city` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , `country` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , `last_login` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL , `email` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , `created_date` DATE NOT NULL , `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ;
